name: Chest Press Machine
description: A machine designed to target the pectoral muscles with independent arm movements to improve balance and strength.

name: Leg Press Machine
description: A machine that allows you to work the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes through a controlled pushing motion.

name: Lat Pulldown Machine
description: A machine designed to target the latissimus dorsi muscles with adjustable resistance for pull-down motions.

name: Dumbbells
description: Free weights that allow for a wide range of strength training exercises, targeting various muscle groups.

name: Classic Bench
description: A flat bench designed for a variety of exercises, including bench presses, dumbbell presses, and more.

name: Barbell
description: A long bar used with weight plates for exercises such as squats, deadlifts, and bench presses, enabling progressive strength training.

name: Kettlebell
description: A cast iron weight with a handle, used for dynamic movements such as swings and Turkish get-ups, as well as strength training exercises.

name: Pull-Up Bar
description: A bar used for bodyweight exercises such as pull-ups and chin-ups to strengthen the back and arms.

name: Parallel Bars
description: Two parallel bars used for exercises such as dips to target the triceps, chest, and shoulders.

name: Bodyweight
description: The use of one's own body as resistance for exercises like push-ups, squats, and planks, ideal for functional strength and flexibility.
